template1.title: Create Campaign email to admin (Approval Off)

emailfields0.subject: New campaign "{{campaign.title}}" is created successfully  on {{info.sitename}}
emailfields0.body:
Dear {{info.adminname}},

A new campaign : {{campaign.title}} was created by {{campaign.first_name}} on {{info.sitename}}. Click here to view all campaigns on the site.

This is system generated email, please do not reply.

smsfields0.body: Hi {{info.adminname}}, A new campaign {{campaign.title}} created by {{campaign.first_name}} went live on site {{info.sitename}}.

template2.title: Create campaign email to Campaign Owner (Approval OFF)

emailfields0.subject: Your campaign "{{campaign.title}}" is created successfully  on {{info.sitename}}
emailfields0.body:
Dear {{campaign.first_name}},

Your campaign - {{campaign.title}} has been created and {{campaign.status}} on {{info.sitename}}. Click here to view all your campaigns.

This is system generated email, please do not reply.

smsfields0.body: Hi {{campaign.first_name}}, Your campaign {{campaign.title}} has been created with {{campaign.status}} status.

template3.title: Create Campaign email to admin (Approval On)

emailfields0.subject: Campaign "{{campaign.title}}" created on {{info.sitename}} and waiting for approval
emailfields0.body:
Dear {{info.adminname}},

{{campaign.first_name}} has created a new campaign - {{campaign.title}} on {{info.sitename}}. It needs your approval before it is available to users.
Click here to view all campaigns on the site.

This is system generated email, please do not reply.

smsfields0.body: Hi {{info.adminname}}, {{campaign.first_name}} has created a new campaign {{campaign.title}}. Visit admin panel to approve this campaign.

template4.title: Create Campaign email to Campaign Owner (Approval On)

emailfields0.subject: Your campaign "{{campaign.title}}" on {{info.sitename}} is pending for approval
emailfields0.body:
Dear {{campaign.first_name}},

Your campaign - {{campaign.title}} has been created on {{info.sitename}} and waiting for admin approval.
You will receive another email once your campaign is approved.
Click here to view all your campaigns.

This is system generated email, please do not reply.

smsfields0.body: Hi {{campaign.first_name}}, Your campaign {{campaign.title}} has been created and it is waiting for admin's approval.

template5.title: Approve Campaign Email to Campaign Owner (Approval On)

emailfields0.subject: Your campaign "{{campaign.title}}" on {{info.sitename}} has been approved
emailfields0.body:
Dear {{campaign.name}},

Your campaign - {{campaign.title}} has been approved by admin on {{info.sitename}}.
Click here to view all your campaigns.

This is system generated email, please do not reply.

smsfields0.body: Hi {{campaign.name}},Your campaign {{campaign.title}} has been approved by admin on {{info.sitename}}.

emailfields0.subject: Campaign "{{campaign.title}}" on {{info.sitename}} has been edited
emailfields0.body:
Dear {{info.adminname}},

{{editor.name}} has edited the campaign - {{campaign.title}} on {{info.sitename}}

Here are the campaign details:
Campaign name: {{campaign.title}}
Category: {{category.title}}
Goal amount: {{campaign.goal_amount}}

Campaign promoter:
Promoter name: {{campaign.first_name}}
Promoter Id: {{editor.id}}

This is system generated email, please do not reply.

smsfields0.body: Hi, {{info.adminname}},{{editor.name}} has made changes to the campaign titled {{campaign.title}} Please check changes here - {{campaign.campaignDetailed}}

template7.title: Edit Campaign mail to campaign owner

emailfields0.subject: Campaign "{{campaign.title}}" on {{info.sitename}} has been edited successfully
emailfields0.body:
Dear {{campaign.first_name}},

Your campaign - {{campaign.title}} has been edited on {{info.sitename}}.

Here are the campaign details:
Campaign name: {{campaign.title}}
Category: {{category.title}}
Goal amount: {{campaign.goal_amount}}

This is system generated email, please do not reply.

smsfields0.body: Hi {{campaign.first_name}}, your campaign {{campaign.title}} has been changed. Please check changes here - {{campaign.campaignDetailed}}

template8.title: Goal amount reached for a campaign

emailfields0.subject: Congrats! Your campaign : {{campaign.title}} on {{info.sitename}} just reached its goal!
emailfields0.body:
Dear {{campaign.first_name}},

Campaign: {{campaign.title}} on {{info.sitename}} has reached its goal amount.

This is system generated email, please do not reply.

smsfields0.body: Hi {{campaign.first_name}}, Congratulations!!! Your {{campaign.title}} campaign has reached its goal amount.

template9.title: Donation paid mail to Campaign Owner (Donation Type Campaign)

emailfields0.subject: New Donation {{order.order_id}} on {{info.sitename}}
emailfields0.body:
Dear {{campaign.first_name}},

You have received a donation on {{info.sitename}}, you will receive another email once the donation payment status changes.

Donation details are as follows.

Payment details
Donation Id: {{payment.order_id}}
Date: {{payment.cdate}}
Donation type: {{payment.donationType}}
Amount: {{payment.amount}}
IP address: {{payment.ip_address}}
Payment method: {{payment.processor}}
Anonymous donation: {{payment.anonymous}}

Payment status
Payment status: {{payment.donationStatus}}

Donor details
Name: {{donor.first_name}}
Email address: {{donor.email}}

Campaign details
Title: {{campaign.title}}
Goal:{{campaign.goal_amount}}
Amount received: {{campaign.amount_received}}

This is system generated email, please do not reply.

smsfields0.body: Hi {{campaign.first_name}}, New donation {{payment.order_id}} received from {{donor.first_name}} and the donation amount is {{payment.amount}}

template10.title: Investment paid mail to Campaign Owner (Investment Type Campaign)

emailfields0.subject: New Investment {{order.order_id}} on {{info.sitename}}
emailfields0.body:
Dear {{campaign.first_name}},

You have received an investment on {{info.sitename}}, you will receive a different email once the investment payment status changes.

Investment details are as follows.

Payment details
Investment Id: {{payment.order_id}}
Date: {{payment.cdate}}
Investment type: {{payment.donationType}}
Amount: {{payment.amount}}
IP address: {{payment.ip_address}}
Payment method: {{payment.processor}}

Payment status
Payment status: {{payment.donationStatus}}

Investor details
Name: {{donor.first_name}}
Email address: {{donor.email}}

Campaign details
Title: {{campaign.title}}
Goal:{{campaign.goal_amount}}
Amount received: {{campaign.amount_received}}

This is system generated email, please do not reply.

smsfields0.body: Hi {{campaign.first_name}}, New investment {{payment.order_id}} received from {{donor.first_name}}, and the donation amount is {{payment.amount}}

emailfields0.subject: A Fresh Chapter Begins – Let’s Make It Count
emailfields0.body:
Dear {{donor.name}},

We are pleased to announce the launch of a new donation campaign: {{campaign.name}}.

You can view the campaign here: Click here to view the campaign

Your generous and continued support plays a critical role in the success of our efforts, and together, we can make an even greater impact on those who need it most.

We sincerely appreciate your commitment to our cause and are grateful to have you as an essential part of our mission.

Thank you once again for your unwavering support.

Warm regards,
Team JGive

smsfields0.body: Hi {{donor.name}}, a new campaign '{{campaign.name}}' has been launched!

template21.title: User want to donate amount greater than threshold

emailfields0.subject: User Donation Amount Exceeds Threshold
emailfields0.body:
Dear {{user.adminname}},

We have observed that a user intends to make a donation exceeding the set threshold. Could you please advise on how you would like to proceed with this request?

Additionally, kindly check the availability for connecting with the specified user at the time provided and update us accordingly.

User Details:

Email: {{user.email}}

Phone: {{user.phone}}

Preferred Time for Contact: {{user.time}}

smsfields0.body: User Donation Amount Exceeds Threshold

replacement_tags.name: user.adminname
replacement_tags.description: Name of the site owner set in global configuration

replacement_tags.name: user.time
replacement_tags.description: Available on time of the user for further communication

emailfields0.subject: Donation Report
emailfields0.body:
Dear Vendor,

Please find the attached your {{attach.period}} donation report. Data consist from period from {{attach.fromDate}} to {{attach.toDate}}.
Please find the report available for download by clicking the link below:

Download your report

Thank you for your continued support.

Best regards,

This is an automated email. Please do not reply.
Please Download and save the pdf file for future use.

smsfields0.body: Hi {{vendor.name}}, your donation report is ready. Download it from the link provided.

replacement_tags.description: Link to the PDF donation report

replacement_tags.description: period like monthly, quartly or yearly
